welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Addison, known for its vibrant culture and friendly locals. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in all this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Alaska Airlines, and several other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights and select domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require a new login every 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Midway Airport serves all domestic flights and is divided into three concourses: A, B, and C.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Midway Airport serves all international flights and is located adjacent to the main terminal.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves domestic flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport serves international flights and provides a seamless travel experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's complimentary WiFi network for internet access during their time at the airport.
